description: If you attempt to create a security rule with an invalid CIDR (e.g. 0.0.0.0/99), you get back a 500 error with "local variable "ip" referenced before assignment".
title: invalid cidr for security rule causes 500 error

comments.content: If you attempt to create a security rule with an invalid CIDR (e.g. 0.0.0.0/99), you get back a 500 error with "local variable "ip" referenced before assignment".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~paul-mcmillan
